parameters.query:
SELECT pi.*, pi.expense_category::text as expense_cat,
       pi.pdf_storage_path,
       s.lexware_contact_id
FROM purchase_invoices pi
JOIN suppliers s ON s.id = pi.supplier_id
WHERE pi.id = '{{ $('Parse Event Data').item.json.purchase_invoice_id }}'::uuid;

UPDATE purchase_invoices SET
  lexware_voucher_id = '{{ $json.body.id }}',
  lexware_synced_at = now(),
  lexware_sync_status = 'synced',
  lexware_sync_error = NULL
WHERE id = '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}'::uuid;

UPDATE purchase_invoices SET
  lexware_sync_status = 'error',
  lexware_sync_error = 'Voucher creation failed'
WHERE id = '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}'::uuid;

INSERT INTO lexware_sync_log (sync_direction, entity_type, entity_id, action, sync_status, error_message)
VALUES ('push', 'purchase_invoice', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}'::uuid, 'create', 'error', 'Lexware API error');

INSERT INTO events (event_type, project_id, payload, source_system, source_flow, reference_table, reference_id)
VALUES (
  'LEXWARE_PUSH_FAILED',
  {{ $('Parse Event Data').item.json.project_id ? "'" + $('Parse Event Data').item.json.project_id + "'::uuid" : "NULL::uuid" }},
  jsonb_build_object('purchase_invoice_id', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}', 'invoice_number', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_number }}'),
  'n8n', 'M6_02c_Lexware_Push_Voucher',
  'purchase_invoices', '{{ $('Build Voucher Payload').item.json.invoice_id }}'::uuid
);
